SupermainQuest.title: Complete 12 main quests
SupermainQuest.rewardText: Great job! You’ve helped everyone make Coastal World a better place. Keep exploring to earn more Coastal Points!

AspirationMain.title: Aspiration
AspirationMain.description:
Talk with Aspiration
and water a tree.
AspirationMain.rewardText: Yeah! There are still {{actorCounts.GrowableTree - 1}} seedlings to water all around the islands. Use your watering can when you are nearby. Find them all to earn more Costal Points!

AvenMain.title: Aven
AvenMain.description:
Talk with Aven
to renovate a house.
AvenMain.rewardText: Well done! There are {{actorCounts.AvenHouse - 1}} other houses to find on the islands. Renovate them to unlock more Coastal Points.

BluevineMain.title: Bluevine
BluevineMain.description:
Talk with Bluevine
to open a new coffee shop.
BluevineMain.rewardText: Great job! Keep your eyes open, there is a chest on the island, next to the coffee shop.

BrigitMain.title: Brigit
BrigitMain.description:
Talk with Brigit
and participate in a
bike race.
BrigitMain.rewardText: Congratulations! Come back anytime and finish your lap in less than {{gameGoals.CircuitBike}} seconds to unlock more Coastal Points.

CoastalMain.title: Coastal
CoastalMain.description:
Talk to Coastal
and participate
in a car race.
CoastalMain.rewardText: What a pilot! Come back anytime and finish your lap in less than {{gameGoals.CircuitCar}} seconds to unlock more Coastal Points.

GreenwoodMain.title: Greenwood
GreenwoodMain.description:
Talk with Greenwood
to turn on the speakers.
GreenwoodMain.rewardText: Awesome! There are {{actorCounts.Speakers - 1}} other speakers to find on the islands. Turn them on to unlock more Coastal Points and bring cool music on Coastal World!

KikoffMain.title: Kikoff
KikoffMain.description:
Talk with Kikoff
and turn on a lighthouse.
KikoffMain.rewardText: Fabulous! Find the {{actorCounts.Lighthouse - 1}} other lighthouses on the islands, and light them on to unlock more Coastal Points.

OneMain.title: One Finance
OneMain.description:
Talk with One Finance
and participate
in a boat race.
OneMain.rewardText: Hey sailor! Come back anytime and finish your lap in less than {{gameGoals.CircuitBoat}} seconds to unlock more Coastal Points.

PomeloMain.title: Pomelo
PomeloMain.description:
Talk with Pomelo
to build the bridge.
PomeloMain.rewardText: Nice! Keep your eyes open, there are chests on the island, next to the house.

ProsperMain.title: Prosper
ProsperMain.description:
Talk with Prosper
to plant a flag.
ProsperMain.rewardText: Great job! Plant a flag on the {{actorCounts.FlagPole - 1}} highest points of the archipelago to unlock more Coastal Points.

TillMain.title: Till
TillMain.description:
Talk with Till
to clean the skatepark.
TillMain.rewardText: Great job! Keep your eyes open, there are chests on the island, next to the skatepark.

ZendaMain.title: Zenda
ZendaMain.description:
Talk with Zenda,
and aid someone in pain.
ZendaMain.rewardText: So nice! There is {{actorCounts.CitizenSick - 1}} other people that need assistance on the islands. Help them and you’ll be rewarded with more Costal Points!

BrigitSide.title: Bike Race
BrigitSide.description: Complete the bike race in under {{gameGoals.CircuitBike}}s.
BrigitSide.rewardText: Complete the bike race in under {{gameGoals.CircuitBike}}s.

CoastalSide.title: Car Race
CoastalSide.description: Complete the car race in under {{gameGoals.CircuitCar}}s.
CoastalSide.rewardText: Complete the car race in under {{gameGoals.CircuitCar}}s.

OneSide.title: Boat Race
OneSide.description: Complete the boat race in under {{gameGoals.CircuitBoat}}s.
OneSide.rewardText: Complete the boat race in under {{gameGoals.CircuitBoat}}s.

ProsperSide.title: Attach flags
ProsperSide.description: Attach all flags to flag poles.
ProsperSide.rewardText: Attach all flags to flag poles.

ZendaSide.title: Help people in pain
ZendaSide.description: Help all the people in pain
